bill_title: revise certain provisions related to contacts between members of the governing body and municipal employees in municipalities using the city manager form of government.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions related to contacts between members of the governing body and municipal employees in municipalities using the city manager form of government. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 9-10-16 be amended to read as follows: 9-10-16. Except for the purpose of inquiry the governing body and its members shall deal with the administrative service solely through the manager, and The governing body shall by ordinance set forth the conditions and situations in which the governing body and its members may establish verbal or written contact with the administrative service, which may include contact for purposes of inquiry or discussion of official business of the municipality and other contacts not related to the official business of the municipality. However, it is a Class 2 misdemeanor for any member of the governing body to give orders to any subordinate of the manager. Upon conviction of a violation of this section, the court in which such conviction is had may , in its discretion , enter an order removing the member of the governing body so convicted from his office. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

Upon conviction of a violation of this section, the court in which such conviction is had may , in its discretion , enter an order removing the member of the governing body so convicted from his office. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. .
